definition: formal ceremonial music of each succeeding Chinese dynasty starting with the Zhou/Korean a'ak/Japanese gagaku

sentences.english: Besides the secular music, there are also elegant music in the Inner Jiaofang.
sentences.chinese: 除了俗樂以外，在內教坊中還有雅樂。

sentences.english: The focus of the interpretation of titles will be laid on the excavation and summary of the lyrics.
sentences.chinese: 每篇題解，重在對雅樂歌辭的本意進行挖掘和概括。

sentences.english: Advocate cornered, so heart a horizontal, allow to stay.
sentences.chinese: 雅樂走投無路，於是把心一橫，容許留下。

sentences.english: Much of that growth will come from the company’s W and Aloft brands.
sentences.chinese: 喜達屋的W和雅樂軒品牌將是其增長的兩個主要動力。

definition: to pass on the light of Buddha
Minyue county in Zhangye 張掖|张掖[Zhang1 ye4], Gansu
folk music, esp. for traditional instruments
to perform music/to play a tune
to read aloud/to recite rhythmically/to chant/to intone (esp. poems in rhythm)
music/rhyme and rhythm/initial, 音[yin1], and final and tone, 韻|韵[yun4], of a Chinese character/phoneme
(Confucianism) rites and music (the means of regulating society)
to walk in the snow to view the flowering plum
